alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 8:21PM MST until December 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Snow accumulations between 4 and 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Nezperce, Soldiers Meadow Road, Craigmont, Winchester, and Kamiah. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to blowing snow this evening. State Route 64 east of Nezperce to Kamiah will see blizzard like conditions and may see closures at times. Snow covered roads with winter travel conditions on Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
